hero.description: Standard card: His voice is tremor, his ways are dirty, but true to his purpose.

cards.description: Premium card: You shall not pass, you shall not prevail, you shall perish.
cards.name: Warden

cards.description: Premium card: No matter how many, his body will fight. Save your breath for the Mountain is strong.
cards.name: Goliath

cards.description: Standard card: Death incarnate. No better time to die than now.
cards.name: The Ripper

cards.description: Premium card: His presence is not known even by ghosts, success at all costs.
cards.name: Sentinel
Winterfell
cards.description: Standard card: The days are cold and so are we. We hope we can close our eyes again.
Standard card: A drink can always be served, with the blood of his enemies.

cards.description: Standard card: When he is near, close your eyes. They betray your mind.
